Race.SpecificTitle: Alderman -- District  4, Town of Oil City
Alderman -- District  5, Town of Oil City
Town of Vivian (Street) -- 2.79 Mills - M&BOA - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Town of Vivian Proposition
(Street Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall the Town of Vivian, State of Louisiana (the Town), continue to levy and collect a special tax of two and seventy-nine hundredths (2.79) mills on all the property subject to taxation within the Town (an estimated $38,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2018 and ending with the year 2027, for the purpose of improving and maintaining public streets in said Town?

Race.SpecificTitle: Town of Vivian (Sewerage) -- 2.79 Mills - M&BOA - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Town of Vivian Proposition
(Sewerage Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall the Town of Vivian, State of Louisiana (the Town), continue to levy and collect a special tax of two and seventy-nine hundredths (2.79) mills on all the property subject to taxation within the Town (an estimated $38,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2018 and ending with the year 2027, for the purpose of maintaining and operating sewers and sewerage disposal works for said Town?

Race.SpecificTitle: Town of Vivian (Waterworks System) -- 1.40 Mills - M&BOA - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Town of Vivian Proposition
(Waterworks System Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall the Town of Vivian, State of Louisiana (the Town), continue to levy and collect a special tax of one and forty hundredths (1.40) mills on all the property subject to taxation within the Town (an estimated $19,180 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2018 and ending with the year 2027, for the purpose of maintaining and operating the waterworks system of said Town, a work of public improvement for said Town?

Race.SpecificTitle: Town of Blanchard Prop. No. 1 -- Wet/Dry-6%PkgAlcoh. - Mayor/BOA
Race.SummaryText:
Town of Blanchard Propositions
Proposition No. 1
Race.FullText: Shall the sale of beverages of alcoholic content containing not more than six percent alcohol by volume be permitted by package only and not for consumption on the premises in the Town of Blanchard, State of Louisiana?

Race.SpecificTitle: Town of Blanchard Prop. No. 2 -- Wet/Dry-6%ConAlcoh. - Mayor/BOA
Race.SummaryText:
Town of Blanchard Propositions
Proposition No. 2
Race.FullText: Shall the sale of beverages of alcoholic content containing not more than six percent alcohol by volume for consumption on the premises be permitted in the Town of Blanchard, State of Louisiana?

Race.SpecificTitle: Town of Blanchard Prop. No. 3 -- Wet/Dry-1/2%ConAlcoh. - Mayor/BOA
Race.SummaryText:
Town of Blanchard Propositions
Proposition No. 3
Race.FullText: Shall the sale of beverage alcohol containing one-half of one percent alcohol by volume and above for consumption on the premises be permitted in the Town of Blanchard, State of Louisiana?

Race.SpecificTitle: Town of Blanchard Prop. No. 4 -- Wet/Dry-1/2%PkgAlcoh. - Mayor/BOA
Race.SummaryText:
Town of Blanchard Propositions
Proposition No. 4
Race.FullText: Shall the sale of beverages of alcoholic content containing one-half of one percent alcohol by volume and above by the package only and not for consumption on the premises be permitted in the Town of Blanchard, State of Louisiana?

Race.SpecificTitle: Town of Blanchard Prop. No. 5 -- Wet/Dry-Restaurant - Mayor/BOA
Race.SummaryText:
Town of Blanchard Propositions
Proposition No. 5
Race.FullText: Shall the sale of beverages of high and low alcoholic content be permitted only on the premises of restaurant establishments which have been issued an "R" permit as defined by law in the Town of Blanchard, State of Louisiana?
